column2: Which of these titles best describes your current job position?
What is your country of residence?
How many years of software development experience do you have?
Which of the following best describes your experience with game engines?
What game engines have you used?
How mentally demanding were the tasks?
How physically demanding were the tasks?
How hurried or rushed was the pace of the tasks?
How successful were you in accomplishing what you were asked to do?
How hard did you have to work to accomplish your level of performance?
How insecure, discouraged, irritated, stressed, and annoyed were you?
